author: sfgate.com
title: Daily Briefing, Sept. 15
text:
Hashtag this
#lunchforce
As the Dreamforce conference brings in an estimated 150,000 people to the area around Moscone Center — and seemingly everywhere else — those who don’t attend are faced with an existential question: Will this screw up my lunch plans? Well, tell us. Use this hashtag and let us know if your favorite spot downtown or South of Market is overwhelmed by Forcers or still bearable and edible. Where should we chew and where should we eschew?
Huh?
Forget “You’re fired!” Contestants on the next “ Celebrity Apprentice ” will have to worry about being terminated — by an expert. NBC has picked a replacement for Donald Trump as leader of the show, and it will be none other than former California Gov. Arnold Schwarzenegger . Let’s hope he doesn’t have a hair trigger.
Fashion 2.0
What goes nicely with a Rebecca Minkoff handbag? Why a drone, of course. As TechCrunch reported , the Minkoff runway show at New York Fashion Week featured a quadcopter with a GoPro , taking aerial footage as each model meandered down the runway.
The Daily Briefing is compiled from San Francisco Chronicle staff and news services. See more items and links at www.sfgate.com . Twitter: @techchronicle
